body: Later that year, on the 23rd of December 1997 at Comiket 53, Touhou 3 Phantasmagoria of Dim.Dream, also known as Yumejiku would be released. It was in development for most of the latter part of 1997. Touhou 3 sold approximately 100 - 150 copies. It was released exclusively for the PC-98.

Before those two were released however, ZUN was already working on the 3rd game, ZUN states in the manual of Touhou 2 Story of Eastern Wonderland that the 3rd game was about 48% complete, and at that time had the name Yumejikan. He later released a trial version, however the exact date it was released on is unknown.

Touhou 1 Highly Responsive to Prayers, also known as Rei'iden and Touhou 2 Story of Eastern Wonderland, also known as Fuumaroku both released in the 15th of August 1997 at Comiket 52. Touhou 1 started and finished it's development sometime in 1995, it is unknown when Touhou 2 started and finished it's development. Touhou 1 sold 30 copies, while touhou 2 sold 50 copies (according to ZUN). They were both released exclusively for the PC-98.
